original_title: 10-hour water cut for Colombo, suburbs on Friday (19) night.
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The National Water Supply and Drainage Board said Colombo and suburbs will experience a 10-hour water cut from 10 PM on Friday (19) to 8 AM on Saturday (20).
Accordingly, the water supply will be suspended to Colombo 4, 5, 7, and 8, as well as the Kotte and Kaduwela Municipal Council areas.
In addition, the water supply will be suspended to the Maharagama and Boralesgamuwa Urban Council areas as well.
